thread.title: Shark mauls 65-year-old, injures his leg off Australia
thread.title_full: Shark mauls 65-year-old, injures his leg off Australia | News24

author: news24.com
title: Shark mauls 65-year-old, injures his leg off Australia
text:
Sydney - A 65-year-old man has been mauled by a shark as a spate of attacks continued off Australia's most populous state.
Police say in a statement the man was paddling a surf ski near the New South Wales state town of Forster, 300km north of Sydney, when he was attacked on Friday.
He was flown by helicopter for emergency surgery to a leg injury. The state ambulance service described the injury as serious.
Two weeks ago, a surfer suffered life-threatening injuries when he was attacked by a shark at Port Macquarie, 100km north of Forster.
